snippet.title: Appeal to find missing Victorian woman
snippet.content: A backpack belonging to a missing Victorian woman has been found on a Gold Coast beach. Police are appealing for information about Gail Elizabeth Oliver after her bag was found by a member of the public on Kurrawa Beach at Broadbeach about 6.15am on Monday. A search of the beach and water failed to locate the 40-year-old, who was reported missing in her home state. Officers have since been told a woman matching Ms Oliver's description was seen walking from the area on Sunday night. Concerns are held for her welfare and anyone with information is urged to contact police. Originally published as
